attributes.action: Admit to the Great People of Britain that the Country is Bankrupt
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We petition the Prime Minister to rid Britain of the Bank of England and restore a publicly run banking system that is there for the benefit of the people of Britain rather than select individuals. We ask that the Prime Minister to inform the British Public that Britain is in fact currently Bankrupt at the hands of private banks. We ask that the Prime Minister restore the treasuries right to print money and that we begin to produce our own money rather than relying on the Bank of England.

rejection.details: We cannot accept petitions which call upon the PM to "recognise", "admit" or "acknowledge" something, as they do not clearly call for a recognisable action
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
